root.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11
root.description: While little is known about the specifics of this game, on the first day of the Game Developers Conference EA revealed that Tiger Woods PGA Tour 11 would utilise the upcoming PS3 Move motion controller and would feature The Ryder Cup as a playable tournament. GameplaySeveral key gameplay changes have been made to the higher difficulty levels. One such change is the addition of "True aim" which will replace the old circle aiming system with simply the general direction the shot will go. Also gone is the camera following the ball flight. This will now be a stationary camera that remains behind the golfer showing only what would normally be seen on the golf course. The Ryder Cup has been added to the game as well featuring the typical setup seen in the real world with 12 vs.12 team play. Playstation Move Now that Move has shipped, PGA Tour 11 has received an update making it compatible with Move. Move allows for 1:1 swings and tilting the controller lets you change the way you take your shot. A demo of Tiger will is available on Move's demo disk. Golfers Male Tiger Woods Rory Mcilroy Chris DiMarco Luke Donald Jim Furyk Retief Goosen Colin Montgomerie Ian Poulter Justin Rose Adam Scott Vijay Singh Mike Weir Michael Campbell Camilo Villegas Darren Clarke Paul Casey Nick Dougherty Anthony Kim Rocco Mediate Stephen Ames Danny Lee Boo Weekley Female Paula Creamer Cristie Kerr Morgan Pressel Natalie Gulbis Suzanne Petterson Fantasy Raczilla Angus MacLeary Travis Knox Elsa Bjorklund Bobbie Leigh Xbox 360 PS3 Course List TPC Sawgrass Turnberry St. Andrews Bethpage State Park Oakmont CC Wentworth Pebble Beach TPC Boston Hazeltine East Lake Torrey Pines Wolf Creek Celtic Manor Resort Liberty National The Greenbrier TPC Scottsdale Whistling Straits DLC Courses for Xbox 360 PS3 Pinehurst™ No. 2 Sheshan Golf CC Harbour Town Golf Links Gary Player Country Club Course Bay Hill Club Lodge® TPC Blue Monster at Doral® Cog Hill Golf CC™ Banff Springs Firestone CC Spyglass Hill® Golf Club Riviera CC (Gamestop Pre-order Bonus) The Predator Highlands River Course at Blackwolf Run Emerald Dragon Wii Course List Celtic Manor Resort (The Twenty Ten Course) The Greenbrier (The Old White Course) Liberty National G.C.
